questions.quote: I'm sorry to make you go through this, but we need to make sure.
Yeah, looks like you're getting a little spare tire there, tiger.
One more peep out of you and I'll slice you up like a smoked sturgeon.
Yes, I'd like to report a problem with one of your mechanics.
You should be thanking me for liberating you from your world of loneliness and isolation. Now, you're part of a family.
So anyway, it's caused a lot of problems. Dan thinks I'm interested in Jerry, he won't let up.
Alright George, I'll be honest. The first time we went out, I found you very irritating. But after seeing you a couple of times, you sorta got stuck in my head,  Ca-stan-za!
I don't really know why I'm here. Kramer talked me into coming up here. But, obviously, I could never really do anything.
Nah, did you hear the end? I couldn't remember what I was trying to say, that whole thing about the, uh...
Uh, maybe we'll just stand and watch the tv. [knock knock]. I gotta go someone's at my door. Yeah!
